name: blueprint-v2

describe.confidence_note: Clear scope, well-understood domain after extensive brainstorming

specify.confidence_note: Revision 2 complete. All 20 adversarial findings integrated. 3 new work units added. Architecture sound.

challenge.confidence_note: PASS_WITH_NOTES: 0 critical, 0 high. 7 medium findings are implementation clarifications, not architectural gaps. All Rev 1 critical/high fixes confirmed addressed.

edge_cases.confidence_note: 21 edge cases catalogued. 4 must-fix, 3 should-fix, 2 document-as-limitation. All addressable at implementation time. No architectural gaps found.

premortem.skip_reason: Challenge + Edge Cases stages provided thorough coverage of failure modes. 16 failure modes already documented in spec. Overlap expected >80%.

review.skip_reason: User decision — no external review planned for this iteration.

test.skip_reason: User decision — tests more valuable after implementation exists. Spec-blind testing deferred.

execute.confidence_note: All 20 Work Units implemented. Cross-reference validation passes (0 violations). Old files removed. 5 new files created, 20+ files updated.

regression_log.trigger: Judge recommended REGRESS: 3 critical findings (HALT state, Empirica enforcement, rename validation)
regression_log.reason: Integrating 3 critical, 5 high, 7 medium, 5 low findings from debate chain

user_overrides.original: Default to vanilla for initial release
user_overrides.override: Keep debate as default — user impressed with debate chain quality

notes: Major enhancement to the planning workflow. Brainstormed in conversation 2026-02-07. Revision 2 integrates all Rev 1 adversarial findings. Rev 2 re-validation passed with notes (0 critical, 7 medium). Edge cases analysis complete: 21 cases catalogued, 4 must-fix, no regression needed. All 20 WUs implemented across 3 sessions. validate-rename.sh passes with 0 violations.
